thread.title: 12 year old sexually assaulted by man she met online: police
thread.title_full: 12 year old sexually assaulted by man she met online: police

title: 12 year old sexually assaulted by man she met online: police
text:
Air Date: February 7, 2017 12 year old sexually assaulted by man she met online: police 
Brantford Police Service headquarters on Elgin Street in Brantford, Ont., are seen on Nov. 23, 2012. (CTV Kitchener) CTV Kitchener   3:19PM EST 
A 12-year-old girl was sexually assaulted by a man she met on an online dating site, Brantford Police say. 
As a result, a 25-year-old man was arrested Thursday and charged with sexual assault and luring a child. 
According to Brantford Police, the girl claimed to be 18 years old when she first started talking to the man, then lowered her supposed age to 16. 
After the two arranged a date, police say, the man drove the girl to a parking lot, touched her inappropriately, and drove her back home. 
The girl eventually contacted police, who made an arrest after a two-week investigation. MyNews If you are on the scene of breaking news and capture it with your mobile device, share your pictures or video with MyNews. MOST WATCHED
